channel.title: Samuel Tonini
channel.description: Lisp, Elixir, Ruby & JavaScript programmer, hacker at the university of bern, open source contributor, dance teacher, rare soul & funk music digger

item.title: My Smartparens and Elixir setup
item.description: As you all could imagine I write a right amount of Emacs Lisp because for Alchemist. To get a bit of support while writing all these parentheses I use a minor mode called Smartparens.
